description: CGGS Sir William Alexander  refit against Supply Arrangement E6HAL-160002.
tags: INDUSTRY (2511: Marine craft equipment and parts)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### CCGS Sir William Alexander Alongside Refit Project

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4546520023-Doc4546542991
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4546520023
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-22T14:00:00

### Project Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is inviting proposals for the alongside refit of the CCGS Sir William Alexander against Supply Arrangement E6HAL-160002. This project involves the refit of the vessel to ensure it remains operational and meets the required safety standards.

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

* **Contract Administrator**: Rachelle LaBrash, rachelle.labrash@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Project Requirements

The successful proponent will be required to provide a comprehensive proposal outlining their approach to the project, including but not limited to:

* Project timeline and milestones
* Resource allocation and management plan
* Quality control and assurance measures
* Safety protocols and procedures

The tender closes on 2024-05-22T14:00:00. All proposals must be submitted in electronic format. Please contact Rachelle LaBrash for more information.  #noindent

### Additional Information

This project is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document. All proponents are expected to ensure their proposal meets the requirements outlined in the RFP document.

Note: The RFP document can be obtained through the government procurement website or by contacting Rachelle LaBrash.  The minimum UNSPSC code for this project is 25111900.  This project does not involve limited tendering.

By submitting a proposal, the proponent acknowledges that they have reviewed and understood the RFP document, terms and conditions, and that their proposal is in compliance with all the requirements outlined in the document.  Please note that the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is the end-user entity for this project
